Server

Class Server

  • java.lang.Object
    • Server.AbstractServer
      • Server.Server

  • public class Server
extends AbstractServer
    Server is extension of the AbstractServer and implements the abstract methods required to handle setting up the server with the game and setting up players.
    Version:
    1
    Author:
    vikfll-0
